definition: to play with fire
to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
surname Huo
to play with fire and get burnt (idiom); fig. to play with evil and suffer the consequences/to get one's fingers burnt

sentences.english: Plays Fire Will Get Burnt! Understand?
He closed the discussion with the remark that "he who plays with fire gets burnt".
sentences.chinese: 他以“玩火者必自焚”這麼一句話結束了討論。

sentences.english: Gaby: Playing with fire, almost getting burned but not quite.
sentences.chinese: 玩火幾乎自焚，但卻又不完全是。

sentences.english: This is fire we are playing with.
In using such class-war rhetoric, Mr Thaksin is playing with fire.
sentences.chinese: 使用這種階級對抗的言辭，他信是在玩火。

sentences.english: Common sense says that when you build a site like The Pirate Bay, you are playing with fire.
sentences.chinese: 常識認爲創建一個像海盜灣這樣的網站是在玩火。

sentences.english: Regardless of warnings he would play with fire.
Most mothers tell their children not to play with fire.
sentences.chinese: 大多數母親告誡孩子不要玩火。

sentences.english: The result will be very serious and I really hope that they would stop playing with fire.
sentences.chinese: 後果將十分嚴重，我真心希望他們停止玩火自焚。

sentences.english: Rosicky got the thistles raked up, but did not stop to burn them.
sentences.chinese: 羅西基得到了荊棘傾斜了，但沒有停下來玩火自焚。

sentences.english: Mr. Nolan is playing with fire here, but partly because he’s a showman.
sentences.chinese: 諾蘭先生在這裏玩火，但部分是因爲他喜歡這調調。

sentences.english: They should learn a lesson from this incident :he who plays with fire will surely get burnt.
sentences.chinese: 他們應從這件事中吸取教訓，玩火者必自焚。

sentences.english: They should learn something from the matter, and somebody who plays with fire will get burnt.
sentences.chinese: 他們應從這件事中吸取教訓，玩火者必自焚。

sentences.english: He closed the discussion with the remark that “he who plays with fire gets burnt”。
sentences.chinese: 他以“玩火者自焚”這麼一句話結束了討論。

sentences.english: To continue would be crazy, they said.
sentences.chinese: 他們認爲再這樣繼續下去，無異於玩火自焚。

stir up the fire and you get burnt (idiom); to get one's fingers burnt/fig. to suffer on account of one's own meddling

to burn to death
